abstract: Abercrombie & Fitch reports second-quarter revenue of $817.8 million, down from $890.6 million, result that nevertheless beats analysts' estimates.
lead_paragraph: The teenage clothing retailer Abercrombie & Fitch’s fiscal second-quarter results topped analysts’ estimates as an important sales metric improved.

headline.main: Abercrombie & Fitch Results Surpass Analysts’ Estimates
headline.print_headline: Abercrombie & Fitch Results Surpass Analysts’ Estimates

snippet: The teenage clothing retailer Abercrombie & Fitch’s fiscal second-quarter results topped analysts’ estimates as an important sales metric improved.
